metadata.h1: Olive Garden Kids Menu With Prices & Calories September 2025
metadata.description: Explore the Olive Garden kids menu for September 2025, featuring a variety of kid-friendly meals with prices and calorie information. Find favorites like Kids Cheese Ravioli and Macaroni & Cheese.

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Kids deserve a feast too, and Olive Garden knows how to keep little food lovers happy. The Kids Menu is full of tasty picks made for young appetites.

KIDS MEALS ‚Äì FOR CHILDREN UNDER 12.description: Delightful and perfectly portioned meals for our younger guests, including classic pasta and chicken fingers.

items.name: Kids Alfredo Sauce with Choice of Pasta (V)
Kids Pizza
items.review: A personal pizza that's perfect for the little ones! üçï Cheesy, saucy, and just the right size. It's a guaranteed crowd-pleaser for even the pickiest eaters.

items.name: Kids Meat Sauce with Choice of Pasta
Kids Tomato Sauce with Choice of Pasta (V)
Kids Five Cheese Marinara with Choice of Pasta (V)
Kids Grilled Chicken with Rotini Pasta & Marinara

items.question: What age group is the Kids Menu designed for?
items.answer: The Kids Menu is crafted for children aged 12 and under.

items.question: Do kids‚Äô meals include sides and drinks?
items.answer: Yes, each kids‚Äô meal comes with a choice of side, such as grapes or steamed broccoli, and a 1% low-fat milk.

items.question: Are there gluten-sensitive options available?
items.answer: Absolutely. Olive Garden offers gluten-sensitive choices like the Kids Rotini with Marinara or Meat Sauce, prepared with gluten-free pasta.
